summary: It\'s a detailed mesh but a simple weapon.  If you have Creation Kit you can change the values because it\'s a slow swing.  That\'s offset by a very powerful hit, though.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s a detailed mesh but a simple weapon.  If you have Creation Kit you can change the values because it\'s a slow swing.  That\'s offset by a very powerful hit, though.  I\'ll be creating more weapons and armor soon!  This is my first real mod for Skyrim.

INSTRUCTIONS:

For those of you who are new to mods, it is a very simple process.  The file included is a .rar file.  Extract this to your Desktop (or anywhere, really).  It will extract a file called \"Mod.\"  Inside are two folders and a .esp file.  Copy and paste these into the \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim installation directory.  If it asks you if you\'d like to merge folders press \"Yes to all\"
author: Thokash
